sentences.en: Marian is such an egotist that she talks about herself all the time.
sentences.cn: 玛利亚过于以自我为中心,喋喋不休地谈论自己.

sentences.en: You can characterize his behavior as that of an egotist.
sentences.cn: 你可以把他的行为归结为一种自我中心主义行为.

words.tran_cn: 自我本位的；自负的；自高自大的

trans.tran_en: someone who likes to talk about how great and important they think they are
